title: Setup Business Metrics and SLO Monitoring
description: Setup Business Metrics and SLO Monitoring.

effort_estimate.justification: Business metrics and SLO monitoring provide insights into the health of the business and help ensure that service level objectives are met.

user_stories: As a business owner, I want to monitor business metrics so that I can understand the health of the business.
business_rules: Business KPI dashboards must be created.
Error budget tracking must be implemented.
Custom application metrics must be created.

blocking_information.can_start_date: After INF-005-A and INF-005-E are completed

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure business metrics and SLOs are properly monitored.
additional_context.security_considerations: Secure the business metrics data to prevent unauthorized access.
